definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Our problem is, bribery has become a hidden regulation of society connivance.
sentences.chinese: 我們的問題是，行賄受賄成爲社會默認的潛規則。

sentences.english: It also contained provisions forbidding bribery and official misconduct.
sentences.chinese: 該項法律還規定，禁止行賄受賄和失職瀆職行爲。

sentences.english: He who bribes is to be despised.
The agent accommodated afterwards accepting been begin accusable of bribery.
sentences.chinese: 這位議員被證明犯有行賄納賄罪後辭職了。

sentences.english: The congressman resigned after having been found guilty of bribery.
sentences.chinese: 此議員被證明犯有行賄受賄罪後辭職了。

sentences.english: Solving the problem of bribery in India is not going to happen overnight.
sentences.chinese: 在印度，解決行賄問題並非朝夕之功。

sentences.english: Finally, proposes four measures to punish the offering bribes.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了加大懲處行賄罪的四個手段。

sentences.english: The man, Mr. Farhang said, would grant a license only in exchange for a hefty bribe.
sentences.chinese: 法爾汗先生表示，此人僅對大量行賄的對象發放執照。

sentences.english: Mr Zhang, alas, is serving an 18-year prison sentence for bribery.
sentences.chinese: 而張此時正在監獄因行賄而服刑18年。

sentences.english: Non-govenment anti-corruption website "I bribe" permanently closed after 20 days re-opened.
sentences.chinese: 民間反腐網站“我行賄了”重開20天后永久關閉。

sentences.english: He tried to corrupt the policeman with money.
sentences.chinese: 他設法用金錢向警察行賄。

sentences.english: The merchant offers a bribe to him.
To stop greasing officials' palms becomes rather difficult in Chinese society.
sentences.chinese: 在中國社會里，杜絕對官員行賄頗爲困難。

sentences.english: Bribery is a serious charge which carries long prison sentences.
sentences.chinese: 行賄罪是非常嚴重罪行，它可能導致極長的服刑期。

sentences.english: Despite all the palm-greasing, Siemens didn't make much money.
sentences.chinese: 儘管行賄沒少花錢，西門子卻沒賺到幾個子。

sentences.english: As one great crime reasons of the social corruption, bribe crime infringes the national missionary functionary actions greatly.
sentences.chinese: 行賄罪作爲賄賂犯罪的一種，具有嚴重的社會危害性。

definition: to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
(of an official) corrupt and negligent of his duty
